#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int Prime[1000001];
int main()
{
  long long int T,M,N,sq,s,i,j;
 
  cin>>T;
  Prime[0]=Prime[1]=1;
  for(i=2;i<=1000;i++)
  {
     if(Prime[i]==0)
     {
     for(j=2;j*i<=1000000;j++)
     {
        Prime[j*i]=1;
     }
     }
  }
  while(T--)
  {
      cin>>N;
      sq=sqrt(N);
      if(sq*sq!=N)  cout<<"NO\n";
      else
      {
        if(Prime[sq]==0) cout<<"YES\n";
        else cout<<"NO\n";
      }
 
 
  }
}
